单中风暴露会引发长期健康风险和代谢脆弱性这项研究将劳累热中风与慢性疾病联系起来，揭示了对体重调节和心脏健康的影响，尤其是在高脂饮食情况下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/single-heat-stroke-posure-triggers-long-term-term-health-risks-and-risks-and-metabolic-vulnerabilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/single-heat-sstroke-corposure-triggers-long-term-term-health-risks-and-risks-and-metabolic-vulnerabilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7715D0B2-42A5-4C15-4C15-8B00-E99B9086E695 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 05:05:00 -0500 Single heat stroke exposure triggers long-term health risks and metabolic vulnerabilities

新工具改善了结核病隔离决策，并精简工作流程怀疑结核病（TB）的患者需要在医疗机构中进行特殊的预防措施，在过去的几年中，美国的结核病病例在美国增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-tool-improves-tb-isolation-decisions-and-streamlines-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/new-tool-improves-tb-isolation-decisions-and-streamlines-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1987E81818-1425-40A0-A148-5516D1FDA881 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 01:43:00 -0500 New tool improves TB isolation decisions and streamlines workflows
南非采取大胆的步骤来对抗宫颈癌尽管宫颈癌现在是一种可预防疫苗的疾病，但每2分钟在全球癌症中，有1名妇女死于宫颈癌。低收入和中等收入国家的妇女受到了不成比例的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/south-africa-takes-bold-steps-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/south-africa-takes-bold-steps-to-combat-cervical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AcdB0530-C370-4D57-4D57-9C42-533BF12FB9AF Mon, 03 Feb 2025 01:41:00 -0500 South Africa takes bold steps to combat cervical cancer
GAP与老化财团的生物标志物合作，以推进阿尔茨海默氏症的研究全球阿尔茨海默氏症的平台基金会（GAP）很高兴地宣布与衰老财团的生物标志物进行合作，这是一个致力于发展和验证衰老和寿命的生物标志物的财团。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/gap-collaborates-with-biomarkers-biomarkers-jaging-gaging-constortium-constortium-constortium-contortium-to-Advance-Alzheimere28099S-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/gap-collaborates-with-biomarkers-omarkers-of-gaging-constortium-consortium-constortium-contortium-to-Advance-Alzheimere28099S-Research.aspx#Comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=594fa44c-bdd5-4b31-9d35-335-33b05f671ddb Mon, 03 Feb 2025 01:38:00 -0500 GAP collaborates with Biomarkers of Aging Consortium to advance Alzheimer’s research
研究探讨了冷水浸入对健康和福祉的影响从早期的海洋蘸酱到冰冷的极地暴跌，在运动员和健康战士中，冷水浸入越来越受欢迎。但是，有多少炒作得到了科学的支持？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-explores-the-felcects-the-fects-of-cold-water-immersion-nealth-health-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250203/study-explores-the-eflects-the-fects-of-cold-water-immersion-on-health-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54AE4A5E-0AE3-43BB-B0F4-42583D974027 Mon, 03 Feb 2025 01:37:00 -0500 Study explores the effects of cold-water immersion on health and wellbeing
巴氏杀菌在牛奶中破坏流感病毒，加强乳制品安全在63°C和72°C下的巴氏灭菌有效地使牛奶中的流感病毒失活，可确保其对人类食用的安全，而仍可以检测到病毒RNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250202/pasteurization-destroys-destroys-influenza-viruess-in-milk-reinforcing-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250202/pasteurization-destroys-destroys-influenza-viruess-in-milk-reinforcing-dairy-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b20b4d75-3d98-4b1f-9dda-ec6cbbcf52cb Sun, 02 Feb 2025 23:19:00 -0500 Pasteurization destroys influenza viruses in milk, reinforcing dairy safety
孤独：两种类型，两种影响以及它们对心理健康的意义孤独不仅是一件事，而且有两种关键形式：情感孤独（缺乏深厚的联系）和社交孤独感（缺乏社交网络）。认识到这些差异对于心理健康干预和公共政策至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250202/loneliness-two-types-two-impacts-and-what-what-what-what--they-mean-for-gental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250202/loneliness-two-types-two-impacts-and-what-what-what-what-they-mean-mean-for-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfbdb8a4-066666666666-4a0e-ac5c-47b522f86f86fd8f Sun, 02 Feb 2025 23:00:00 -0500 Loneliness: Two types, two impacts, and what they mean for mental health
